title: lvl 7
body: Hello .. I know Riot fixed how on profil werent showed other champs with lvl 6 or 5 then that 3 best .. now it showing 6 lvls u know .. 7 lvl best champ .. next 2 champs with highest score .. and then next 8 .. but I achive today fourth champ with 7 lvl .. and he disapear again .. in next 8 best is showing only 6 lvl champs .

replies.body:
The 1st tab shows your top 3 champs which Targons Blade mentioned, the 2nd tab only shows champs from levels 1 - 6.

You can still view all your champs your mastery levels in the "Champions" tab though!

Champion Mastery on your profile should always list your 3 highest mastery champs first, then 5 other champions you have high mastery with from highest to lowest. This can change a bit if you're playing a larger pool of champs and earning mastery points on new champs every day.

Let me know if you have any questions.
